text: If the environment were a bank it would have been saved already.
From Day One, the Trump Admin has sold out our children’s health to enrich special interests & big polluters pushing their toxic agenda.

At least 500,000 Americans go bankrupt every year because of medical expenses—and the actual number is probably more like 750,000.

No one in America should go bankrupt to get the care they need. It's time for Medicare for All.
https://berniesanders.com/medical-bankruptcy-is-real-even-if-the-washington-post-refuses-to-believe-it/
If allowed to become law, this rule threatens to choke our communities with pollution – poisoning families’ health today, and threatening their security and well-being for decades to come.

How crazy is it that there was no in-state tuition for all students in California, until the 1970s? College was free.

Not crazy at all.
